TopicTitle: Pod is in the ocean, how do I get it back to the space center?

Articles.Content:
Hello all,

I'm new here, I managed to land back in the ocean. But now the crew is still in the ocean and I already launched another crew in space in orbit. For some reason, I figured if I just went back to teh space center it would automatically bring back the original pod and crew. I noticed after I lauched, there was a second pod on the map view. (oops)

Pod is in the ocean, how do I get it back to the space center?

Go to the tracking centre to get back to the pod and then select end flight rather than space centre on the escape menu. That will finish the flight and remove the pod from the map and the kerbonauts properly back into your pool.
Thanks, I appreciate that. Worked excellent. Sorry, I'm new here.
Endless is correct. When you return to space center from a flight, your other flight stays in operation. You have to select end flight to return the pilots and remove the pod from the system.
